title: Elon Musk Becomes First Person Worth $500 Billion in 2025
shortdescription: Tesla and SpaceX valuations push Musk past $500B milestone as he sets new wealth records.
description: Elon Musk becomes first person to reach $500 billion net worth as Tesla and SpaceX valuations soar.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Jeff Bezos Sells $10 Billion Amazon Stock in One Week – Biggest Insider Sale Ever
shortdescription: Bezos cashes out ahead of expected capital gains tax hike under new administration.
description: Amazon founder executes pre-planned 10b5-1 sale of 50 million shares — proceeds to fund Blue Origin and real estate empire.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Bernard Arnault Becomes First European Worth $300 Billion
shortdescription: LVMH CEO joins exclusive $300B club as luxury goods dominate global markets.
description: Bernard Arnault becomes first European to reach $300B net worth as LVMH luxury empire expands globally.
author: Wade Jenner

title: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang Joins $200 Billion Club After AI Chip Boom
shortdescription: AI revolution makes Huang first semiconductor executive to reach $200B milestone.
description: Jensen Huang joins $200B club as NVIDIA dominates AI chip market with record profits.
author: Wade Jenner
